 URL : "https://github.com/radswiat/webpack-auto-inject-version/issues/9" TITLE : argsv.en arg fails BODY : hi, i'm getting an error on webpack 2. package.json: devdependencies: webpack: 2.3.3 webpack-auto-inject-version: 0.5.1 version: 0.2.0 webpack.config.js webpackautoinject = require webpack-auto-inject-version ; plugins: new webpackautoinject log c:\myfolder ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js:276 return boolean argv.env arg ; ^ typeerror: cannot read property 'aiv-log-full' of undefined at isargv c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js:276:26 at log.getloglevel c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js: 170:29 at new log c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js:164:10 at object.<anonymous> c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion. js:233:19 at __webpack_require__ c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion .js:30:30 at object.<anonymous> c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion. js:728:12 at __webpack_require__ c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion .js:30:30 at c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js:76:18 at c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackautoinjectversion.js:79:10 at webpackuniversalmoduledefinition c:\myfolder ode_modules ode_modules\webpack-auto-inject-version\dist\webpackauto injectversion.js:3:20
